name: 法洛伊幻境 Fareo Shadowlands
description:
"Fareo: Shadowlands" is a turn-based SRPG which is both challenging and of deck building depth. The story takes place in Fareo, a world with fast-growing machinery and magic. When the creatures from all over the world were busy blending the flames of war and the collision of civilizations, a weird space-time rift fell from the sky and divided the central continent of Fareo, El’Carlo, into two. The precious treasures in the abyss rift have attracted numerous brave men. As an outstanding commander, you are also invited to build an elite team and explore the secrets of the rift...

Ingenious battle mode




Replace the traditional characters' movement with the distinctive "Command Card". In the battle, you can not only experience the pleasure of combat scenes, but also enjoy the satisfaction brought by strategic arrangement.

Innovative battlefield transformation

Remove annoying obstacles, or make them the keys to your victory.

Unlimited combinations

There are more than 40 heroes with unique skills. Each hero has unique game play and mechanism. There are more than 10 million combinations of equipment and teams. Define victory in your own way!

Brand new hunting laws

Unique large creature hunting game play. Make the most of strategy!

Rogue-like Dungeons

Explore and adventure in dungeons relying on strategy and luck. Secrets and surprises are hidden behind every dark corner.

Why did the rift fall from the sky and why did everything inside the rift seem to be familiar? Welcome to join our official chat group to discuss. Floyd is waiting for you to compose your brilliant legend!
